database.name: VIEW OPCRM_RECENTLYUPDATED_V
database.view: SELECT get_uuid() AS opcrm_recentlyupdated_v_id, u.ad_client_id, u.ad_org_id, u.isactive, u.created, u.createdby, u.updated, u.updatedby, u.ad_user_id, u.em_opcrm_computednames AS leadcommercialname, u.em_opcrm_leadstatus AS opcrm_leadstatus, u.em_opcrm_stat_stage_id AS opcrm_stat_stage_id, u.comments, u.phone, u.email, u.em_opcrm_assigned_to AS assigned_to, u.em_opcrm_statusupdated AS statusupdated, opp.opportunity_name, opp.opportunity_amount, opp.opportstatus, opp.expected_close_date, opp.probability, opp.description, COALESCE(u.em_opcrm_statusupdated, u.created) AS lastupdated FROM ad_user u LEFT JOIN opcrm_opportunities opp ON opp.related_lead = u.ad_user_id WHERE u.em_opcrm_islead = 'Y' ORDER BY COALESCE(u.em_opcrm_statusupdated, u.created) DESC
